item.title: Trump Family’s Land Deals in Albania Stir Up Lingering Resentments

item.title: Middle East Crisis: Polio Vaccinations in Gaza Are Beating Goals, W.H.O. Says
item.description: In its first two days, the campaign to vaccinate 640,000 Gazan children has been more successful than expected, a W.H.O. official said.

item.title: Maduro Declares Christmas in October in Venezuela
item.description: With the nation’s democracy in shambles, President Nicolás Maduro tries to inject some holiday cheer.

item.title: Here are the latest developments.
item.description: Two ballistic missiles hit an educational institution and a neighboring hospital in Poltava, eastern Ukraine, President Volodymyr Zelensky said.
